name: ☐​☐☐☐: an experimental narrative
description:
☐☐☐☐ : an experimental narrative  

is about a relationship between two friends. Discover a slice of life from different perspective, and try to retrace the events...

All your decisions costs you a part of your lifetime. "Press R to watch with a new eye" : that's how it asks you to pay with your own life.

__________________________________________

This game is an entry for the 44h Ludum Dare, and also our first participation in a Game Jam. We're two art students and we worked here on Game Maker

We know that some adjustments may be required, all feedbacks are welcomed !

__________________________________________

Choose with UP and DOWN

Speedup or go back with LEFT and RIGHT

Select with SPACE

Toogle fullscreen with F

__________________________________________

Changelog v2 : text collapsing and speed fixing.

Changelog v3 : more text collapsing and speed fixing, press LEFT to go back.

Changelog v4 :  more and more text collapsing and speed fixing, press RIGHT to go speedup.

Add macOS version

Changelog v5 : more and more and more text collapsing. Change the aspect ratio to make reading easier.
